SELECT VERSION_ID FROM (SELECT VERSION_ID FROM QUESTIONNAIRE_TB ORDER BY VERSION_ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUESTIONNAIRE_TB(VERSION_ID, VERSION_TITLE, Q_NUMBER, CONTENT) VALUES(#{version_id}, #{version_title}, #{q_number}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT answer.version_id, answer.question_date, answer.name, question.version_title FROM (SELECT QUESTIONNAIRE_ANSWER_TB.version_id, interviewee_vt_id, interviewer_ea_id, question_date, name FROM QUESTIONNAIRE_ANSWER_TB, EA_TB WHERE interviewee_vt_id='1111' AND EA_TB.SERIAL_NUMBER = '1111') answer, Questionnaire_tb question WHERE answer.version_id = question.version_id
